selectTheOptionDesc.title: Anonīma ziņošana par vietni, kurā ir darbības traucējumi, palīdz mums uzlabot lietotni.
selectTheOptionDesc.note: The user will see this UI when they're running into issues with a given website, that we may be causing

selectTheOptionDescV2.title: Izvēlies atbilstošāko problēmas raksturojumu.
selectTheOptionDescV2.note: A heading that encourages the user to select from a list of reasons a website might be broken

selectTheCategoryType.title: Kāda ir problēma?
selectTheCategoryType.note: A heading that encourages the user to select the kind of problem from a list. Options such as: 'The site is not working as expected', 'I dislike the content on this site' or 'General DuckDuckGo browser feedback'

categoryType1.title: Vietne nedarbojas, kā paredzēts
categoryType1.note: The user wants to report that the site isn't functioning as they expect it to.

categoryType2.title: Man nepatīk saturs šajā vietnē
categoryType2.note: The user wants to report that they didn't like the content of the site in question.

categoryType3.title: Vispārīgas atsauksmes par DuckDuckGo pārlūku
categoryType3.note: The user wants to provide feedback about our application, not the site in question

selectTheCategory.title: Kas nedarbojas šajā vietnē?
selectTheCategory.note: A heading that encourages the user to select from a list of reasons a website might be broken, like `videos didn't play' or 'site layout is broken'

tryTurningProtectionsOff.title: Mēģiniet izslēgt privātuma aizsardzību, lai redzētu, vai tas novērš problēmu.

skipThisStep.title: Izlaist šo soli
skipThisStep.note: Text within a button that allow the user to skip to the next step

pickYourIssueFromTheList.title: Aprakstiet notikušo
pickYourIssueFromTheList.note: Asks the user to pick a specific list from the pulldown

blocked.title: Vietne ir bloķēta vai netika ielādēta
blocked.note: User is reporting this page because the page didn't load

layout.title: Vietnes izkārtojums ir bojāts
layout.note: User is reporting this page because the page layout appears broken

emptySpaces.title: Vietnē ir lielas tukšas vietas
emptySpaces.note: User is reporting this page because the page contains large empty spaces

videos.title: Video netika atskaņots vai ielādēts
videos.note: User is reporting this page because a video didn't play or load correctly

images.title: Attēli netika ielādēti
images.note: User is reporting this page because one or more images did not load

comments.title: Komentāri, atsauksmes vai tērzēšana netika ielādēta
comments.note: User is reporting this page because one or more comments did not load

content.title: Trūkst satura
content.note: User is reporting this page because some other type of content did not load

links.title: Saites vai pogas nedarbojas
links.note: User is reporting this page because one or more links or buttons did not work when clicked

login.title: Nevar pierakstīties/reģistrēties
login.note: User is reporting this page because they are unable to log into the website

loginV2.title: Nevar pierakstīties vai reģistrēties
loginV2.note: User is reporting this page because they are unable to log into the website

shopping.title: Nevar norēķināties vai iepirkties
shopping.note: User is reporting this page because they are unable to log into the website

browser.title: Pārlūkprogrammas vai cita pārlūkprogrammas paplašinājuma problēma
browser.note: User is reporting this page because there a problem with the browser or another extension

paywall.title: Vietne man lūdza atspējot reklāmu bloķētāju
paywall.note: User is reporting this page asked them to disable their privacy or ad blocking extension

other.title: Kaut kas cits
other.note: User is reporting this page because of some other reason than the ones we listed

tellUsMoreDesc.title: Sniedz sīkāku informāciju (neobligāti):{bullet}Kas notika?{bullet}Kam būtu bijis jānotiek?{bullet}Vai aizsardzības izslēgšana palīdzēja?
tellUsMoreDesc.note: A hint for a text box that lets user enter free text to describe their problem. There are 3 questions as a guide, and each 'bullet' is replaced with a bullet point - such as '• What happened?'

reportsAreAnonymousDesc.title: Ziņojumos, kas tiek nosūtīti DuckDuckGo, tiek iekļauta tikai informācija, kas mums nepieciešama, lai reaģētu uz tavām atsauksmēm.
reportsAreAnonymousDesc.note: A small disclaimer at the bottom of the view describing what is included in the report

thankYou.title: Paldies!
thankYou.note: Title for what the user sees upon submitting the report

yourReportWillHelpDesc.title: Tavs ziņojums palīdz padarīt DuckDuckGo{newline}labāku visiem lietotājiem!
yourReportWillHelpDesc.note: Body that the user sees upon submitting the report. Do not translate {newline} but place it within the translated text as to break the string into two or more lines resulting in a balanced layout

dislike.title: Man nepatīk saturs
dislike.note: User is reporting this page because they dislike something on the page

otherRequired.title: Lūdzu, apraksti problēmu, ar kuru saskāries (obligāti)
otherRequired.note: Placeholder text in a form where the user must provide additional information

otherOptional.title: Lūdzu, apraksti problēmu, ar kuru saskāries (nav obligāti)
otherOptional.note: Placeholder text in a form where the user can provide additional information, but is not required to

descriptionRequired.title: Apraksts ir obligāts
descriptionRequired.note: Error message shown to user in a form when a description field is required but was not entered

suggestionWhatHappened.title: Kas notika?
suggestionWhatHappened.note: Suggestion to enter a description of what problem the user was experiencing

suggestionWhatHappened2.title: Kam bija jānotiek?
suggestionWhatHappened2.note: Suggestion to enter a description of what the user expected to happen, but didn't

suggestionWhatHappened3.title: Vai aizsardzības izslēgšana palīdzēja?
suggestionWhatHappened3.note: Suggestion to mention if turning off privacy protections helped solve a problem the user was having

reportTitle.title: Ziņo DuckDuckGo
reportTitle.note: Used as a screen heading for a breakage report flow.
